Year: The fiscal year for the IT budget allocation.
Quarter: The fiscal quarter for the IT budget allocation.
Total IT Budget: The total IT budget allocated for the specified quarter in USD.
Cybersecurity Allocation: The portion of the IT budget allocated specifically for cybersecurity initiatives.
Cybersecurity Percentage: The percentage of the total IT budget allocated to cybersecurity.
Other Initiatives Allocation: The remaining portion of the IT budget allocated to other IT initiatives apart from cybersecurity.
